summary: Dark comedy where a married couple comes to the aid of a jailed uncle.
cast: Billy Bob Thornton|Laura Dern|Diane Ladd|Kelly Preston|Andy Griffith|Sandra Seacat|John Prine|Jeff Bailey|Jim Varney|Brenda Blethyn|Tuesday Knight|Walton Goggins|Daniel Steven DiVito|Jamie Lee Curtis|Ben Affleck|James Michael Andrews|Claire Basham|Logan Carelock|Richard Crowe|Susan Carol Davis|Thomas Chander Duke|Chris Ellis|Wayne Emmons|Becky Fly|Amanda Foreman|Benjamin Greene Jr.|Tamara Glynn|Bellina Logan|Brent Douglass Lynn|Joe McCrackin|Kenneth McDougal|Ritchie Montgomery|Don Taylor|Harry Thomason|Daniel Treat|Judy Pryor Trice|Matthew Rall Hesen Jr.
title: Daddy and Them
